title: "AI industrial chain spurred on by Sora"
excerpt: "China's artificial intelligence industrial chains, including computing power, cloud servers and data centers, are expected to usher in unprecedented development opportunities amid a worldwide frenzy around Sora, a new text-to-video AI model developed by US-based research company OpenAI, creator of chatbot ChatGPT, experts said."
